All things Las Vegas Grand Prix and Grand Prix Plaza—right at your fingertips.
As the official app of the FORMULA 1 HEINEKEN LAS VEGAS GRAND PRIX presented by T-Mobile, you can seamlessly manage tickets, navigate the circuit, stay updated on the latest F1® news, and explore everything happening at Grand Prix Plaza from the palm of your hand. It’s your one-stop shop for all things Las Vegas Grand Prix and Grand Prix Plaza.  

App features:  
• Ticketing  
• Wayfinding  
• News & Results  
• Event Updates  
• Event Schedule & Guides  
• Partner Perks  
• Food & Beverage  
• Entertainment  
• Grand Prix Plaza activities, entertainment, and more

Welcome to SSEN App, the ultimate live streaming and score tracking app for all major sports leagues in India! Our app provides you with world-class features and viewing experience, along with vital statistics about your favourite players, leagues, and teams.

With our app, you can enjoy live matches and events, match highlights, league information, team groups and standings, club profiles, and much more. All our free content is available, for ease of access. 

Download SSEN App today and enjoy the ultimate sports experience in India!

Never miss a moment of soccer action with our Football Live Score App, your essential tool for up-to-the-minute match updates. Whether you're a passionate supporter or a casual observer, our app provides instant access to live scores, match schedules, and detailed stats from leagues around the world. With personalized alerts and comprehensive coverage, you'll stay informed and engaged with the game.

Our app offers a smooth and intuitive experience, making it easy to follow all the soccer action. Experience the thrill of real-time goals and match updates, and enjoy the excitement of football like never before.

features:

Live Score Updates: Access real-time scores from matches across all major leagues and tournaments worldwide. Get immediate notifications for goals and other key moments as they happen.

Fixture Details: View comprehensive schedules of upcoming matches, so you can plan your viewing ahead of time. Follow your favorite teams and see when they play next.

Download the Football Live Score App today and stay updated with the latest soccer scores and match schedules. With our app, you’ll never miss out on any of the action, whether it’s the Premier League, La Liga, or international competitions. Join the community of soccer fans who trust us for timely updates and stay in touch with the beautiful game.

Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of football with live score available through our live football score app. Download now for to watch live football score.

For an uninterrupted experience, consider subscribing to access all app features without ads through an auto-renewing subscription available on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal within your iTunes Account Settings after purchase, ensuring flexibility and control over your subscription.

Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

Link to Privacy Policy: https://pbapps001.blogspot.com/p/privacy-policy.html

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback! 
Email: contact@365scores.com
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/365Scores
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/365scores
Follow us on X:  https://x.com/365scores

Terms of use: https://365scores.info/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://365scores.info/pages/privacy

Golfify

Create and manage golf competitions intuitively from end to end giving a much more connected game experience to players on and off the course. Whether you are playing a casual game with some friends or taking part in a 100 group competition, Golfify will increase player enjoyment and reduce the admin involved in organising golf competitions.
 
Create Competitions

Anyone can create competitions in just a number of seconds. Choose from a number of game modes and over 42,000 courses worldwide. Invite players to join the competition, or add them manually users. There only needs to be one active device per a group to score. This is perfect when you have players who don’t want to use the app. 

Realtime Leaderboards and Statistics

Want to know what score you need on the 18th to beat your friend, or maybe even win the championship? Now you can. Players have access to the full leaderboard which is updated in realtime, just like a professional tournament. 

View stats 

When the golf is finished, and the results confirmed, review your stats to see where you can improve for next time. 

We hope you love using Golfify. 

Watch this space, we have some great features in the pipeline! 

Golfify - Bringing Golf to Life

Terms of Use:
https://www.golfify.io/terms-of-use

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

PIN Sport App revolutionizes how you connect and engage with sports.

Get instant access to matches, tournaments, and teams across multiple sports — all in one place. Whether you play football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, skating, or esports, PIN Sport App brings every game and opportunity to your fingertips.

Create your player or club profile, discover local and international teams, and connect directly with athletes, coaches, and sports professionals. Find your next team or help your club attract new players, coaches, physios, and support staJ — all through one easy-to-use platform.

With an intuitive interface, PIN Sport App gives your team, profile, and events maximum visibility. Showcase achievements, share updates, and grow your sports community faster than ever.

Key Features:
Multi-Sport Integration – Explore events, teams, and clubs across all major sports.
Player & Club Profiles – Build your presence and highlight your sports journey.
Team Discovery – Find teams near you or let clubs find you.
Open Positions – Clubs can post roles for players, coaches, and physios.
Community Connection – Follow athletes, join clubs, and grow your network.
Quick Event Creation – Organize games and tournaments easily.
Real-Time Updates – Stay informed with instant notifications and match details.

Whether you’re searching for a new team or recruiting talent for your club, PIN Sport App makes sports simple, visible, and connected. Download now and be part of the game.

The CBS Sports App is everything a sports fan needs in one place. Get customized alerts based on your favorite teams, players and leagues, stream live games from CBS & Paramount+ and stay on top of the biggest news in the sports world. With the CBS Sports App, you’ll have the ability to watch NFL, UEFA Champions League, PGA Championship, Big Ten Football, the Masters, the NWSL, Concacaf Nations League, NCAA Basketball, WNBA and more—either free or via your existing TV provider.

With the CBS Sports app, you’ll get:

•The fastest app for scores and breaking news from all major sports, so you’re always the first to know 
• Advanced gametrackers to follow your team when you don’t have the ability to watch the game
• CBS Sports HQ, a 24/7 free sports news & highlights network with onsite coverage from the biggest sports events
• CBS Sports Golazo Network, a 24/7 free soccer channel with live matches, exclusive studio shows like Morning Footy and Box 2 Box, news, highlights, documentaries and more

beIN SPORTS is the ultimate destination for sports fans — bringing you the latest news, videos, highlights, live scores, standings, and expert analysis on the teams, leagues, and stars you love.



What makes us different?



- Personalized for you: Select your favorite sports, leagues, and teams — we’ll serve the content that matters most.
- Stay in the game: Get real-time push notifications for goals, match updates, and key moments from your favorite teams.
- Exclusive access: Watch the latest highlights and goals from the world’s top leagues, only on beIN SPORTS.
- At a glance: Our news & results widget keeps the top stories and live scores just one tap away.

Experience SPORTS and Entertainment Anywhere, Anytime!
 
Stream on tablets and mobile devices wherever you are and dive into a world of high-quality live streaming that includes:
• Top global sports tournaments on beIN SPORTS channels.
• Blockbuster movies and trending series for unforgettable moments.
• Kids' channels to keep the little ones entertained.
 
A unique and all-inclusive experience that includes:
▪ High Quality Premium Channels, including 4K Channel.
▪ High speed streaming with low Latency (as less as 15 seconds latency from satellite service).
▪ Personalized Reminders and Push Notifications service to keep you updated on the latest matches.

▪ Interactive TV Guide showcasing live events and replays on all channels.

 
This service is exclusively available for users in the Middle East and North Africa region.

The official app of FIFA World Cup 26™. Follow every match with live scores, fixtures, line-ups, advanced stats, fantasy games, ticket information, and highlights-crafted for a premium, global fan experience.

Live match centers: Real-time scores, line-ups, formations, and player ratings.
Fixtures & schedules: Browse by date, team, group, stage.
Standings & brackets: Live group tables, knockout brackets, and progression paths.
Stats: Team trends, player leaders, records, and match insights that matter.
Tickets & key dates: Official ticket info, timelines, and event guidance in one place.
Highlights & recaps: Must-see videos, condensed match recaps, and editorial news.
Personalization: Follow your favorite team to get tailored feeds and notifications.
Smart alerts: Kick-off, goals, cards, full‑time.

Built for FIFA World Cup 26™

Fast, clear, reliable: A smooth experience on matchday and every day.
Global and local: Follow the world’s tournament your way with content that fits your interests.
Official and trusted: The authentic destination for FIFA World Cup 26™ updates.

From the opening match to the final, FIFA World Cup 26™ keeps you connected to fixtures, form, and the moments that define the tournament. Track every goal, analyze performance, and relive every highlight—wherever you are.

This is just the start: some FIFA World Cup 26™ features aren’t available yet, with new updates and exclusive content rolling out ahead of the tournament.

Download now and experience FIFA World Cup 26™ with live scores, smarter stats, and the official matchday companion in your pocket.

Ten Sports is a Pakistani sports television channel. It was launched in 2002 and has since become the most popular sports channel in Pakistan. The channel is dedicated to broadcasting a wide range of sports events, including cricket, football, hockey, tennis, and other popular sports.

Ten Sports has the exclusive broadcasting rights for major sports events such as the Pakistan Super League (PSL), International Cricket Council (ICC) events, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) events, and various domestic and international sports leagues.
Ten Sports channel also features various sports analysis programs, expert opinions, and talk shows to keep its viewers up-to-date with the latest sports news and happenings. Ten Sports broadcasts live cricket tv 24 hours a day, and its programs can be accessed through cable and satellite networks across Pakistan and some other countries.

Not just live scores, this app also provides live match toss and playing 11 updates, news updates and you will also be able to check upcoming Cricket matches schedule, browse upcoming Cricket series of team India, and all the other International Cricket teams and T20 leagues schedules.

I hope you like our efforts and this app is add value in your mobile apps collection & you no need to another app for sports because this app is the one solution app of sports entertainment.

Thanks

TeamReach has everything you need to manage and instantly communicate with your team, club, or group. It's EASY, INTUITIVE, SAFE and FREE!

• MESSAGES - TeamReach saves you time and reduces confusion by serving as a central place for all team communications.
• SCHEDULES - No more guessing when and where games and practices are taking place. Includes reminders, maps and forecast.
• INSTANT UPDATES - Immediately notify your team of last minute changes: game time, location, cancellation, uniform, and more.
• AVAILABILITY - Easily find out who can attend a game, practice or special event by sending out an availability request to the group.
• EVENT DETAILS - Everyone will know the time, place, driving directions, forecast, and attendees.
• POLLS - Get instant team input on restaurants, practice times, hotels, gear, etc.
• PHOTOS - Conveniently view, share, and download photos in one place.
• SAFE - It’s an easy way for coaches, players, and parents to communicate safely without exchanging texts, emails, or phone calls.

 - Free, Easy, & Saves Time
TeamReach is designed to simplify life for everyone involved. Managers and coaches can create teams in seconds, and parents or players can easily join by entering a group code. The team has a central place for all communication, and this eliminates the need for phone calls, emails, and handouts. 

- Safe, Protects Coaches, Players & Parents
It's a safe way for coaches, players, and parents to communicate without exchanging contact information. Players do not have access to the coach's number and the coach does not have access to a players' number. It's an easy way to protect everyone and keep the conversation in one place.

- Right Place, Right Time
In a nutshell, we help the team be at the right place at the right time. Players and parents get notified of any schedule changes. Also, the coach or team manager can send out any last minute notifications including: change in location, weather delay, game time, cancellation, uniform color, and more.

- Great for Any Sport
The TeamReach App is perfect to reach out and communicate with all types of sports teams and leagues including: Soccer, Basketball, Volleyball, Baseball, Football, Pickleball, Track & Field, Skating, Diving, Cycling, Running, Skiing, Fencing, Sailing, Bowling, Ice Hockey, Badminton, Athletics, Softball, Cheerleading, Water Polo, Gymnastics, Equestrian, Martial Arts, Swim, Rowing, Spirit Squad, Rugby, Field Hockey, Wrestling, Golf, Cross Country, Cricket, Lacrosse, Tennis, and more. 
  
- Perfect for Any Club, Group, or Activity
TeamReach isn't just for sports management. It's a great App for any group, club, or activity including: Boy Scouts, Girl Scouts, YMCA, Church & Faith Group, Camp, PTO, School, Dance Class, Band, Student Association, Family, Student Government, Charity Group, Fraternity, Sorority, Nonprofit Organization, Book Club, Study Group, Rotary Club, Volunteer Group, Key Club, United Way Chapter, Day Care, and Alumni Associations. Keep it simple for your group and reach out with messages, instant notifications, schedule of meetings, and easily remind everyone of an important event. 

Get Started Today! It's EASY, INTUITIVE, SAFE and FREE.

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

With the CricFy TV : Live Score Football app, you can stay updated with soccer live scores and stats, match highlights, and league standings at no cost. We cover matches from the Premier League to the World Cup, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action!

Get real-time score updates, detailed match stats, team standings, and more on your mobile device with our comprehensive football app.

CricFy TV : Live Score gives you access to a world of football, from live scores to in-depth league tables, team statistics, and match results. Discover matches and get detailed stats and live match scores on every game.

WHY CricFy TV : Live Score FOR FOOTBALL FANS?
- Live Sports Scores: Stay updated with real-time scores from matches around the world
- League Standings: View complete league tables with team positions and statistics
- Match Stats: Dive into detailed stats, scores, and team lineups
- Worldwide Coverage: Coverage of major competitions including Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, and more
- Accurate & Reliable: Trust our up-to-date data from football-data.org API
- Dark Mode: Beautiful dark and light themes for comfortable viewing
- Arabic Support: Full RTL layout support for Arabic users

LIVE MATCHES AND DETAILED STATS
Experience the thrill of football with live scores & stats, comprehensive league standings, and in-depth match analysis.
WORLDWIDE COVERAGE - LIVE MATCH SCORES
